#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <math.h>
#include <vector>
#include <string>
#include <map>
#include <set>
#include <queue>
#include <algorithm>
#define lli long long int
#define gc getchar//_unlocked
#define mod 1000000007

using namespace std;
/*
int getsum(int k)
{
    int ret=0;
    while(k>0)
    {
        ret+=k%10;
        k=k/10;
    }
    return ret;
}*/
int main()
{
    int i,j,t,n,ans;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d",&n);
        if(n==0)
        {
            ans = 0;
        }
        else if(n<=6)
        {
            ans = 2;
        }
        else if(n<=75)
        {
            ans = 3;
        }
        else if(n<=480)
        {
            ans = 4;
        }
        else if(n<=2205)
        {
            ans = 5;
        }
        else if(n<=8232)
        {
            ans = 6;
        }
        else if(n<=26544)
        {
            ans = 7;
        }
        else
        {
            ans = 8;
        }
        printf("%d\n",ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
